May 24, 1926 D Llandovery Contest (Class B)
Llandovery Contest (Class B) 30 Test Piece Contest Llandovery Contest llandovery-contest-class-b
The Talisman [Balfe, unknown arranger]
Llandovery, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Prizes - 1st £10 and shield, 2nd £6, 3rd £3. 4 bands competed.
Nov. 9, 2018, 11:09 a.m. March 4, 2021, 11:01 p.m.

2 Brynamman Town Herbert Rees
3 Cwmaman Institute Silver (Tower Colliery) Band Ben Jones
